Entries.CF_Fish: Dear @, my beloved skipper, ^ Your angling skills surpass even my ol' Pappy's... I'm impressed. ^ This stardrop's been passed down from Willy Sr. to Willy Jr. for... oh, heck. Prob'ly a thousand years.^Seein' as how we're married and all... I want you to have it.^^ -Willy   ^  %item object 434 1 %%
